faq.question: Do I need hosting after registering a domain?
faq.answer: Yes, registering a domain is only the first step. To make your website accessible online, you'll need a hosting plan. After completing your domain registration, you can explore our VPS hosting and web hosting packages to get your site up and running quickly.

faq.question: Can I just purchase domain registration services?
faq.answer: Yes, you can purchase your domain from us and choose any hosting service you prefer with no obligations. However, please note that support is only available for our hosting customers, and domain management will be self-managed.

faq.question: Do you provide free DNS?
faq.answer: Yes, we can provide free DNS. Alternatively you can use multicast DNS providers like Cloudflare, Akamai or Route 53 from AWS.

faq.question: What is the cookie duration for domain referrals?
faq.answer: We offer a 90-day cookie window for our affiliate program. This means if someone clicks your affiliate link, you'll receive credit for any purchase they make within 90 days.

faq.question: Can I transfer my domain to Expanse Hosting?
faq.answer: Yes! Transferring your domain to Expanse Hosting is easy. Our renewal process is fully automated upon payment, and we'll help you through the transfer process.

faq.question: Are there any hidden fees?
faq.answer: No! We offer transparent pricing with no low introductory rates followed by high renewal fees. What you see is what you pay.
